name: useSessionStorage
description: Custom hook that uses the [`sessionStorage API`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Window/sessionStorage) to persist state across page reloads.

props.name: key
props.description: The key under which the value will be stored in session storage.

props.name: initialValue
props.description: The initial value of the state or a function that returns the initial value.

props.name: options
props.description: Options for customizing the behavior of serialization and deserialization (optional).

schema.name: deserializer
schema.description: A function to deserialize the stored value.

schema.name: initializeWithValue
schema.description: If `true` (default), the hook will initialize reading the session storage. In SSR, you should set it to `false`, returning the initial value initially.

schema.name: serializer
schema.description: A function to serialize the value before storing it.
